repo.name: uvg266
repo.description: An open-source VVC encoder based on Kvazaar

readme.summary: README provides comprehensive parameter documentation and basic usage examples, but lacks clear installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions provided - only compilation section exists but doesn't show how to install or use the compiled binary, and troubleshooting section is completely absent despite being listed in table of contents

injection_risks.description: Use of fopen with user-controlled input (args->opts->input) without proper validation
Use of fprintf with user-controlled input (args->opts->input) without proper validation, but it's used for error reporting only

critical_findings: Potential file inclusion vulnerability due to lack of input validation for args->opts->input
security.summary: The code has some security concerns related to input validation and error exposure, but no critical vulnerabilities were found.

common_complaints: Preset management and configuration issues causing invalid output
Encoder output not compatible with standard tools (FFmpeg, Elecard)
Compilation errors on specific platforms (macOS, Android, x86)
praise_themes: Appreciation for the project and ongoing work
Interest in feature requests (4:4:4 input, AVX-512 support)
sentiment.summary: Community shows moderate frustration with technical bugs and platform support gaps; slow maintainer responsiveness to critical encoding issues and platform-specific compilation failures suggests possible abandonment.

red_flags: Occasional lack of clear instructions for new contributors
Some responses are brief and could be more detailed
communication.summary: The maintainer provides useful technical insights but could improve clarity and engagement with new contributors.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (2026-01-07)
3 open issues with no activity or resolution
Zero closed issues in past 6 months indicating no bug fixes
No merged PRs in past 6 months showing no feature development
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests irregular release cadence
positive_signals: Repository exists and has basic issue tracking setup
maintenance.summary: This package appears abandoned with no maintenance activity for 6 months despite open unresolved issues.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides a good overview of the package's features and usage, but lacks clear installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: Docs: Installation instructions are incomplete and unclear.
Communication: Occasional lack of clear instructions for new contributors
Communication: Some responses are brief and could be more detailed
Security: Potential file inclusion vulnerability due to lack of input validation for args->opts->input
highlights: Multiple contributors in the last six months
